name: playwright-workshop-esp
description: Este workshop está basado en la versión en inglés de Butch Mayhew impartido en la conferencia Ministry of Testing  [Hands on Test Automation With Playwright](https://www.ministryoftesting.com/events/hands-on-test-automation-with-playwright#sessions) workshop. Link al repo original: <https://github.com/BMayhew/mot-playwright-workshop>
